Create a support group for fellow creatives who struggle with jealousy: Title: "Green-Eyed Monsters Anonymous"
Develop a new app that helps users identify and overcome sources of envy: Title: "EnvyEradicator"
Create a series of workshops focused on building self-awareness and self-compassion: Title: "The Envy Workshop"
Host a "Jealousy Jam" event, where creatives can come together to share their work and receive feedback: Title: "Jammin' with Jealousy"
Develop a podcast that explores the psychology of envy and its impact on creativity: Title: "The Envy Effect"
